name: P31
prompt: Security camera footage from elevated wide-angle camera mounted on garage, suburban home driveway and front yard at midday. Bright natural daylight with clear sky, well-lit scene with defined shadows. A familiar family SUV, recognizable license plate, pulls smoothly into usual parking spot. The vehicle pulls into the driveway and parks, driver door opens, and a person steps out. Vehicle comes to complete stop, slight pause before door opens, person emerges and stands briefly. Fixed camera position, wide field of view covering driveway and street approach, slight barrel distortion at edges, Clear high-quality footage typical of daytime security camera recording. Realistic human motion, 15-second duration.
